QuestData.Title: Upon the Ramparts
QuestData.Description: Some of the mantid have made it on top of the wall. There's some risk they'll route the soldiers we have posted there if their numbers are large enough.$B$BI need you to get on top of the wall and help clear out any that have broken through.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Krik'thik mantid on top of the Gate of the Setting Sun.
